bookstore.api.akamai.com.title: OK
bookstore.api.akamai.com.detail: The hostname is signed with the provided certificate chain and API Gateway can establish a secure connection.

bookstore-premium.api.akamai.com.title: CN_MISMATCH_ERROR
bookstore-premium.api.akamai.com.detail: The common name in the hostname certificate doesn't correspond to the common name in the hostname. Ensure that both entities refer to the same common name.
